result.arabic_text: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى
result.translation: Musa araheza abwira Firawuni ati: “Isango ryo guhurirako, ni ku musi w’ihimbazwa ry’ibirori, igihe abantu bazoba bambaye bakaberwa, bakazokorana mu gitondo izuba riva, bavuye mu mihingo yose”.
